actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt certain distributions used to pay expenses of higher education from the additonal tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt qualified higher education expenses from the ten percent penalty tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt certain distributions used to pay expenses of higher education from the additonal tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans.
